"Estoy en mi elemento: el elemento sorpresa".
—Mogai, explorador sultai

cards.name: Scout the Borders
cards.originalText: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

foreignNames.name: 传言具现
foreignNames.text:
展示你牌库顶的八张牌。你可以将其中一张生物牌放进战场。将其余的牌置入你的坟墓场。
威猛～如果你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则改为你可以将其中两张生物牌放进战场，而非一张。

foreignNames.name: 傳言具現
foreignNames.text:
展示你牌庫頂的八張牌。你可以將其中一張生物牌放進戰場。將其餘的牌置入你的墳墓場。
威猛～如果你操控力量等於或大於4的生物，則改為你可以將其中兩張生物牌放進戰場，而非一張。

foreignNames.name: Voir ce qui n'est pas écrit
foreignNames.text:
Révélez les huit cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre sur le champ de bataille une carte de créature parmi elles. Mettez le reste dans votre cimetière.
Férocité — Si vous contrôlez une créature avec une force supérieure ou égale à 4, vous pouvez mettre sur le champ de bataille deux cartes de créature au lieu d'une.

foreignNames.name: Das Ungeschriebene erkennen
foreignNames.text:
Zeige die obersten acht Karten deiner Bibliothek offen vor. Du kannst davon eine Kreaturenkarte ins Spiel bringen. Lege den Rest auf deinen Friedhof.
Wildheit — Falls du eine Kreatur mit Stärke 4 oder mehr kontrollierst, kannst du zwei Kreaturenkarten statt einer ins Spiel bringen.

foreignNames.name: Vedere Ciò che Non è Scritto
foreignNames.text:
Rivela le prime otto carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere sul campo di battaglia una carta creatura scelta tra esse. Metti le altre nel tuo cimitero.
Ferocia — Se controlli una creatura con forza pari o superiore a 4, puoi mettere sul campo di battaglia due carte creatura invece di una.

foreignNames.name: 書かれざるものの視認
foreignNames.text:
あなたのライブラリーの一番上から８枚のカードを公開する。あなたは、それらの中にあるクリーチャー・カードを１枚戦場に出してもよい。残りをあなたの墓地に置く。
獰猛 — あなたがパワーが４以上のクリーチャーをコントロールしているなら、代わりにクリーチャー・カードを２枚戦場に出してもよい。

foreignNames.name: 태고의 존재를 보다
foreignNames.text:
당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 여덟 장을 공개한다. 당신은 그중에서 생물 카드 한 장을 전장에 놓을 수 있다. 나머지 카드는 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.
흉포 — 당신이 공격력이 4 이상인 생물을 조종한다면, 대신에 당신은 한 장이 아닌 두 장의 생물 카드를 전장에 놓을 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Ver o Não Escrito
foreignNames.text:
Revele os oito cards do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar um card de criatura dentre eles no campo de batalha. Coloque o restante em seu cemitério.
Feroz — Se você controla uma criatura com poder igual ou superior a 4, você pode colocar dois cards de criatura no campo de batalha em vez de um.

foreignNames.name: Увидеть Ненаписанное
foreignNames.text:
Покажите восемь верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить на поле битвы находящуюся среди них карту существа. Положите остальные карты на ваше кладбище.
Свирепость — Если вы контролируете существо с силой не менее 4, вы можете положить на поле битвы две карты существ вместо одной.

foreignNames.name: Ver lo no escrito
foreignNames.text:
Muestra las ocho primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner en el campo de batalla una carta de criatura que se encuentre entre ellas. Pon el resto en tu cementerio.
Ferocidad — Si controlas una criatura con fuerza de 4 o más, puedes poner en el campo de batalla dos cartas de criatura en vez de una.

cards.name: See the Unwritten
cards.originalText:
Reveal the top eight cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest into your graveyard.
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may put two creature cards onto the battlefield instead of one.

rulings.text: You determine whether the ferocious ability applies before any creature cards are put onto the battlefield. If you put two creature cards onto the battlefield this way, those creatures enter the battlefield at the same time.
Because you’re not casting the creature cards, you can’t pay any additional or alternative costs. You can’t put the cards onto the battlefield face down.
If a card you put onto the battlefield this way has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

Some ferocious abilities that appear on instants and sorceries use the word “instead.” These spells have an upgraded effect if you control a creature with power 4 or greater as they resolve. For these, you only get the upgraded effect, not both effects.
Ferocious abilities of instants and sorceries that don’t use the word “instead” will provide an additional effect if you control a creature with power 4 or greater as they resolve.

cards.text:
Reveal the top eight cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest into your graveyard.
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may put two creature cards onto the battlefield instead of one.

cards.flavor: The Temur call the flickering lights the Path of Whispers, believing that they lead the way to ancestral knowledge.

foreignNames.name: 探寻天际
foreignNames.text: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张基本地牌，展示这些牌，并将它们置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 铁木尔将这灵动辉光称为细语之路，相信它们领向先祖知识之所在。

foreignNames.name: 探尋天際
foreignNames.text: 從你的牌庫中搜尋至多三張基本地牌，展示這些牌，並將它們置於你手上。然後將你的牌庫洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 鐵木爾將這靈動輝光稱為細語之路，相信它們領向先祖知識之所在。

foreignNames.name: À la recherche de l'horizon
foreignNames.text: Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque jusqu'à trois cartes de terrain de base, révélez-les et mettez-les dans votre main. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: Les Temur appellent ces lumières scintillantes la Voie des murmures et croient qu'elles mènent à la connaissance ancestrale.

foreignNames.name: Den Horizont absuchen
foreignNames.text: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach bis zu drei Standardland-Karten, zeige sie offen vor und nimm sie auf deine Hand. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Temur nennen die flackernden Lichter den Pfad des Flüsterns und glauben, dass sie den Weg zum Wissen ihrer Vorfahren weisen.

foreignNames.name: Cercare l'Orizzonte
foreignNames.text: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per trovare fino a tre carte terra base, rivelale e aggiungile alla tua mano. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: I Temur chiamano le luci guizzanti il Cammino dei Sussurri, poiché credono che conducano a una conoscenza ancestrale.

foreignNames.name: 地平の探求
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カードを最大３枚まで探し、それらを公開し、あなたの手札に加える。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: ティムールの者たちはちらつく光を「囁きの道」と呼んでおり、それらは祖先の知識に続いているものと信じられている。

foreignNames.name: 지평선을 찾아서
foreignNames.text: 당신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드를 최대 세 장까지 찾아 공개한 후 당신의 손으로 가져간다. 그 후 당신의 서고를 섞는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 테무르인들은 속삭임의 길이라고 부르는 반짝거리는 불빛이 고대의 지식을 알려준다고 믿는다.

foreignNames.name: Procurar o Horizonte
foreignNames.text: Procure em seu grimório até três cards de terreno básico, revele-os e coloque-os em sua mão. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: Os Temur chamam as luzes bruxuleantes de Caminho dos Sussurros, acreditando que elas mostram o caminho para o conhecimento ancestral.

foreignNames.name: Поиск Горизонта
foreignNames.text: Найдите в вашей библиотеке не более трех карт базовых земель, покажите их и положите их в вашу руку. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: Темуры называют мерцающие огни Путем Шепотов и верят, что они указывают путь к знаниям предков.

foreignNames.name: Buscar el horizonte
foreignNames.text: Busca en tu biblioteca hasta tres cartas de tierra básica, muéstralas y ponlas en tu mano. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: Los Temur llaman a las luces titilantes "la senda de los susurros", creyendo que muestran el camino a conocimientos ancestrales.

cards.name: Seek the Horizon
cards.originalText: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.text: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: "See your enemies from a thousand sides. Then you will find a thousand ways to kill them."

foreignNames.name: 烟卜师
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}：检视目标牌面朝下的生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「从一千个侧面观察你的敌人。你就能找到一千种杀死他们的方法。」

foreignNames.name: 煙卜師
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}：檢視目標牌面朝下的生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「從一千個側面觀察你的敵人。你就能找到一千種殺死他們的方法。」

foreignNames.name: Devin des fumerolles
foreignNames.text: {1}{U} : Regardez la créature ciblée face cachée.
foreignNames.flavor: « En observant vos ennemis sous un millier d'angles, vous trouverez mille manières de les tuer. »

foreignNames.name: Rauchdeuter
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}: Schau dir eine verdeckte Kreatur deiner Wahl an.
foreignNames.flavor: „Betrachte deine Feinde aus tausend Blickwinkeln. Dann wirst du tausend Wege finden, sie zu töten."

foreignNames.name: Divinatore del Fumo
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}: Guarda una creatura bersaglio a faccia in giù.
foreignNames.flavor: "Osserva i tuoi nemici da mille angolazioni diverse. Potrai così scoprire mille modi differenti per ucciderli."

foreignNames.name: 煙の語り部
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}：裏向きのクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それの表側を見る。
foreignNames.flavor: 「千の異なる角度から敵を見よ。さすれば、それを倒す千の異なる方法が見えてくるだろう。」

foreignNames.name: 연기 점쟁이
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}: 뒷면 상태의 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 본다.
foreignNames.flavor: "네 적을 천 개의 방향으로 바라보면, 그들을 해치울 천 개의 방법이 보일 것이다."

foreignNames.name: Vidente da Fumaça
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}: Olhe a criatura alvo voltada para baixo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Veja seus inimigos de mil lados diferentes. Assim, você encontrará mil maneiras de matá-los."

foreignNames.name: Чтец Дыма
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}: посмотрите целевое существо, находящееся рубашкой вверх.
foreignNames.flavor: «Взгляни на врага с тысячи сторон. Так ты узнаешь тысячу способов его уничтожить».

foreignNames.name: Narrador de humo
foreignNames.text: {1}{U}: Mira la criatura objetivo que está boca abajo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Observa a tus enemigos desde un millar de perspectivas. Así encontrarás mil maneras de matarlos".

cards.name: Smoke Teller
cards.originalText: {1}{U}: Look at target face-down creature.

rulings.text: Smoke Teller’s ability lets you look at the creature as the ability resolves. It doesn’t let you look at it later, although you should be given a reasonable amount of time to look at it. In a multiplayer game, be sure not to reveal the card to other players.

You could target a creature you control with Smoke Teller’s ability, but there’s no benefit to doing so. Remember, you may look at face-down spells you control on the stack and face-down permanents you control at any time.

cards.text: {1}{U}: Look at target face-down creature.

cards.flavor: "You can have the body, necromancer. I just want the skin."

foreignNames.name: 苏勒台剥皮师
foreignNames.text: 每当一个由你操控且防御力等于或大于4的生物死去时，你获得4点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 「你可以拿走尸体，死灵术士。我只要皮。」

foreignNames.name: 蘇勒台剝皮師
foreignNames.text: 每當一個由你操控且防禦力等於或大於4的生物死去時，你獲得4點生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 「你可以拿走屍體，死靈術士。我只要皮。」

foreignNames.name: Écorcheuse sultaï
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois qu'une créature que vous contrôlez avec une endurance supérieure ou égale à 4 meurt, vous gagnez 4 points de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: « Tu peux prendre le corps, nécromancien. Je ne veux que la peau. »

foreignNames.name: Sultai-Schinder
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn eine Kreatur mit Widerstandskraft 4 oder mehr stirbt, die du kontrollierst, erhältst du 4 Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Den Körper kannst du haben, Nekromagier. Ich will nur die Haut."

foreignNames.name: Scorticatrice Sultai
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta una creatura che controlli con costituzione pari o superiore a 4 muore, guadagni 4 punti vita.
foreignNames.flavor: "Puoi prenderti il corpo, necromante. Mi interessa solo la pelle."

foreignNames.name: スゥルタイの剥ぎ取り
foreignNames.text: あなたがコントロールするタフネスが４以上のクリーチャーが１体死亡するたび、あなたは４点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.flavor: 「屍術士よ、遺体の方はくれてやる。私が欲しいのは表皮だけだ。」

foreignNames.name: 가죽을 벗기는 술타이
foreignNames.text: 당신이 조종하는 생물 중 방어력이 4 이상인 생물이 죽을 때마다, 당신은 생명 4점을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "사령술사여, 몸은 네가 가져가도 좋다. 난 가죽만 있으면 된다."

foreignNames.name: Esfolador Sultai
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que uma criatura que você controla com resistência igual ou superior a 4 morre, você ganha 4 pontos de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: "Você pode ficar com o corpo, necromante. Eu só quero a pele."

foreignNames.name: Султайский Свежеватель
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда существо под вашим контролем с выносливостью не менее 4 умирает, вы получаете 4 жизни.
foreignNames.flavor: «Тело можешь оставить себе, некромант. Мне нужна только кожа».

foreignNames.name: Desolladora sultai
foreignNames.text: Siempre que una criatura que controlas con resistencia de 4 o más muera, ganas 4 vidas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Puedes quedarte con el cuerpo, nigromante. Yo solo quiero la piel".

cards.name: Sultai Flayer
cards.originalText: Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, you gain 4 life.

rulings.text: If Sultai Flayer dies, and its toughness is still 4 or greater, its own ability will trigger.

cards.text: Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, you gain 4 life.

foreignNames.name: 铁木尔战马
foreignNames.text:
变身～从你手上展示一张绿色牌。（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）
当铁木尔战马翻回正面时，目标生物获得践踏异能直到回合结束。

foreignNames.name: 鐵木爾戰馬
foreignNames.text:
變身～從你手上展示一張綠色牌。（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌並支付{3}，將其當成2/2生物。可隨時支付其變身費用使其翻回正面。）
當鐵木爾戰馬翻回正面時，目標生物獲得踐踏異能直到回合結束。

foreignNames.name: Batailleur temurien
foreignNames.text:
Mue — Révélez une carte verte de votre main. (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte face cachée comme une créature 2/2 pour {3}. Retournez-la à tout moment pour son coût de mue.)
Quand le Batailleur temurien est retourné face visible, la créature ciblée acquiert le piétinement jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignNames.name: Temur-Streitross
foreignNames.text:
Morph—Zeige eine grüne Karte auf deiner Hand offen vor. (Du kannst diese Karte verdeckt für {3} als eine 2/2 Kreatur wirken. Decke sie zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt für ihre Morph-Kosten auf.)
Wenn das Temur-Streitross aufgedeckt wird, verursacht eine Kreatur deiner Wahl Trampelschaden bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignNames.name: Destriero Temur
foreignNames.text:
Metamorfosi—Rivela una carta verde dalla tua mano. (Puoi lanciare questa carta a faccia in giù come una creatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Girala a faccia in su in qualsiasi momento pagando il suo costo di metamorfosi.)
Quando il Destriero Temur viene girato a faccia in su, una creatura bersaglio ha travolgere fino alla fine del turno.

foreignNames.name: ティムールの軍馬
foreignNames.text:
変異 — あなたの手札にある緑のカードを１枚公開する。（あなたはこのカードを、{3}で２/２クリーチャーとして裏向きに唱えてもよい。これの変異コストで、これをいつでも表向きにしてよい。）
ティムールの軍馬が表向きになったとき、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それはトランプルを得る。

foreignNames.name: 테무르 군마
foreignNames.text:
변이—당신의 손에서 녹색 카드 한 장을 공개한다. (당신은 {3}을 지불해서 이 카드를 뒷면 상태의 2/2 생물로 발동할 수 있다. 언제든지 변이 비용을 지불하고 앞면이 보이도록 뒤집을 수 있다.)
테무르 군마가 앞면으로 뒤집히면, 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 돌진을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Corcel Temur
foreignNames.text:
Metamorfose — Revele um card verde na sua mão. (Você pode conjurar este card com a face voltada para baixo como uma criatura 2/2 por {3}. Volte sua face para cima a qualquer momento pagando seu custo de metamorfose.)
Quando Corcel Temur é voltado para cima, a criatura alvo ganha atropelar até o final do turno.

foreignNames.name: Темурский Скакун
foreignNames.text:
Оборотень — Покажите зеленую карту, находящуюся в вашей руке. (Вы можете разыграть эту карту рубашкой вверх как существо 2/2 за {3}. Переверните ее рубашкой вниз в любой момент за ее стоимость Оборотня.)
Когда Темурский Скакун переворачивается рубашкой вниз, целевое существо получает Пробивной удар до конца хода.

foreignNames.name: Acometedor temur
foreignNames.text:
Metamorfosis—Muestra una carta verde de tu mano. (Puedes lanzar esta carta boca abajo como una criatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Ponla boca arriba en cualquier momento pagando su coste de metamorfosis.)
Cuando el Acometedor temur se ponga boca arriba, la criatura objetivo gana la habilidad de arrollar hasta el final del turno.

cards.name: Temur Charger
cards.originalText:
Morph—Reveal a green card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Temur Charger is turned face up, target creature gains trample until end of turn.

rulings.text: Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

cards.text:
Morph—Reveal a green card in your hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Temur Charger is turned face up, target creature gains trample until end of turn.

foreignNames.name: 神秘踪迹
foreignNames.text:
每当一个牌面朝下的生物在你的操控下进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。
每当一个由你操控的永久物翻回正面时，若其是生物，则它得+2/+2直到回合结束。

cards.name: Woolly Loxodon
cards.originalText: Morph {5}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

rulings.text: Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

cards.name: Abomination of Gudul
cards.originalText:
Flying
Whenever Abomination of Gudul deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
Morph {2}{B}{G}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

rulings.text: Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

cards.name: Anafenza, the Foremost
cards.originalText:
Whenever Anafenza, the Foremost attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on another target tapped creature you control.
If a creature card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

rulings.text: Anafenza’s first ability can target any tapped creature you control. That creature doesn’t necessarily have to be attacking.

While Anafenza is on the battlefield, abilities that trigger whenever a nontoken creature your opponent owns dies won’t trigger, as that card will never reach that player’s graveyard. (Token creatures will still go to the graveyard briefly before ceasing to exist.)

If your opponent discards a creature card while Anafenza is on the battlefield, abilities that function when a card is discarded (such as madness) still work, even though that card never reaches a graveyard. In addition, spells or abilities that check the characteristics of a discarded card (such as Chandra Ablaze’s first ability) can find that card in exile.

Anafenza’s last ability cares only what the card would be in the zone it’s moving from, not what it would be in the graveyard. For example, if a land card you control becomes a creature due to an effect and then dies, the land card will be exiled. But if a creature card with bestow is an Aura when it would be put into the graveyard, it ends up in the graveyard.

rulings.text: If the target creature can’t block Avalanche Tusker, but could block another attacking creature, it’s free to block that creature or block no creatures at all.

If, during the declare blockers step, the target creature is tapped or is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t block, then it doesn’t block. If there’s a cost associated with having that creature block, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost. If the player doesn’t, the creature doesn’t block in that case either.

cards.name: Crackling Doom
cards.originalText: Crackling Doom deals 2 damage to each opponent. Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures he or she controls.

rulings.text: If a player controls two or more creatures tied for the greatest power among creatures he or she controls, that player chooses one of them to sacrifice.
The sacrifice is not dependent on the damage being dealt. It doesn’t matter if that damage is prevented or redirected.
Crackling Doom doesn’t target any player or creature. For example, a creature with protection from black could be sacrificed.

In a multiplayer game, each opponent, starting with the active player and proceeding in turn order, chooses which creature he or she will sacrifice and then all creatures are sacrificed at the same time. Each successive player will know what the players before him or her chose to sacrifice.

cards.name: Deflecting Palm
cards.originalText: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. If damage is prevented this way, Deflecting Palm deals that much damage to that source's controller.

rulings.text: Deflecting Palm doesn’t target any creature or player. You choose a source of damage as Deflecting Palm resolves.

If multiple prevention and/or replacement effects are trying to apply to the same damage, the player who would be dealt damage chooses the order in which to apply them. Notably, if noncombat damage would be dealt to you by a source controlled by an opponent, you choose the order in which to apply Deflecting Palm and the planeswalker redirection effect. If you apply Deflecting Palm first, the damage will be prevented (and damage will be dealt to the source’s controller) and the planeswalker redirection effect won’t apply.

cards.name: Efreet Weaponmaster
cards.originalText:
First strike
When Efreet Weaponmaster enters the battlefield or is turned face up, another target creature you control gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
Morph {2}{U}{R}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

rulings.text: Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

cards.name: Ivorytusk Fortress
cards.originalText: Untap each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it during each other player's untap step.

rulings.text: Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it untaps at the same time as the active player’s permanents. You can’t choose to not untap them at that time.
Effects that state a creature you control doesn’t untap during your untap step won’t apply during another player’s untap step.
Controlling more than one Ivorytusk Fortress doesn’t allow you to untap any creature more than once during a single untap step.

foreignNames.name: Senhor Lich de Kheru

foreignNames.name: Владыка Личей из Керу

Если она должна покинуть поле битвы, изгоните ее вместо того, чтобы поместить в какую-либо другую зону.

foreignNames.name: Señor liche de Kheru

cards.name: Kheru Lich Lord
cards.originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return a creature card at random from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains flying, trample, and haste. Exile that card at the beginning of your next end step. If it would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

rulings.text: You decide whether to pay {2}{B} as the ability resolves.
The creature card returned to the battlefield is chosen at random as the ability resolves. If any player responds to the ability, that player won’t yet know what card will be returned.
Because the ability doesn’t target any creature card, any creature card (including Kheru Lich Lord itself) put into the graveyard in response to that ability may be returned to the battlefield.

The ability that exiles the card at the beginning of your next end step is a delayed triggered ability. If the delayed triggered ability is countered, the creature will stay on the battlefield and the ability won’t trigger again. However, the replacement effect will still exile the creature when it eventually leaves the battlefield.

Kheru Lich Lord grants flying, trample, and haste to the creature that’s returned to the battlefield. However, neither of the “exile” abilities is granted to that creature. If that creature loses all its abilities, it will still be exiled at the beginning of your next end step, and if it would leave the battlefield, it is still exiled instead.

If a creature card returned to the battlefield with Kheru Lich Lord would leave the battlefield for any reason, it’s exiled instead. However, if that creature is already being exiled, then the replacement effect won’t apply. If the spell or ability that exiles it later returns it to the battlefield (as Suspension Field might, for example), the creature card will return to the battlefield as a new object with no relation to its previous existence. The effects from Kheru Lich Lord will no longer apply to it.
The exiled creature is never put into the graveyard. Any abilities the creature has that trigger when it dies won’t trigger.

cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return a creature card at random from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains flying, trample, and haste. Exile that card at the beginning of your next end step. If it would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

cards.name: Kin-Tree Invocation
cards.originalText: Put an X/X black and green Spirit Warrior creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the greatest toughness among creatures you control.

rulings.text: The value of X is determined only once, as Kin-Tree Invocation resolves. The power and toughness of the Spirit Warrior token doesn’t later change if the greatest toughness among creatures you control changes.

If you control no creatures as Kin-Tree Invocation resolves, you’ll put a 0/0 token onto the battlefield. Unless something else is raising its toughness above 0, it will immediately be put into its owner’s graveyard and then cease to exist. Any abilities that trigger when a creature enters the battlefield or dies will trigger.

foreignNames.flavor: 飛螳騎兵明白他們的坐騎對他們沒有任何忠誠。只要騎手稍不留神，即使是騎乘了多年的螳螂也會把騎手吃掉。

foreignNames.name: Chevaucheur de mante
foreignNames.text: Vol, vigilance, célérité
foreignNames.flavor: Les chevaucheurs de mante savent que leur monture n'a que faire de la loyauté. Même montée depuis des années, celle-ci n'hésiterait pas à dévorer un chevaucheur distrait.

foreignNames.name: Mantis-Reiter
foreignNames.text: Fliegend, Wachsamkeit, Eile
foreignNames.flavor: Mantis-Reiter wissen, dass ihnen ihre Reittiere keine Loyalität schulden. Selbst eine bereits seit Jahren zugerittene Mantis würde ihren Reiter sofort fressen, sollte er jemals die Konzentration verlieren.

foreignNames.name: Cavalcamantidi
foreignNames.text: Volare, cautela, rapidità
foreignNames.flavor: I cavalcamantidi sanno che i loro destrieri non nutrono alcuna lealtà. Anche una mantide sellata da anni divorerebbe un cavaliere che perdesse la concentrazione per un solo istante.

foreignNames.name: カマキリの乗り手
foreignNames.text: 飛行、警戒、速攻
foreignNames.flavor: カマキリの乗り手たちは、騎乗している乗用動物が自分たちに対して忠誠を持っていないことを理解している。何年も騎乗してきたカマキリでさえ、一瞬でも集中力を切らした騎乗者をためらいもなく食べてしまう。

foreignNames.name: 사마귀 기수
foreignNames.text: 비행, 경계, 신속
foreignNames.flavor: 사마귀 기수들은 사마귀들이 충성스럽지 않다는 사실을 잘 알고 있다. 수년 동안 함께해온 사마귀조차 기수가 잠깐 한눈을 팔면 기수를 먹어치워버린다.

foreignNames.name: Ginete de Mantídeo
foreignNames.text: Voar, vigilância, ímpeto
foreignNames.flavor: Os ginetes de mantídeos sabem que não podem contar com a fidelidade de suas montarias. Mesmo um mantídeo cavalgado por anos pode consumir um cavalgador que perca a concentração por um instante.

foreignNames.name: Всадник на Богомоле
foreignNames.text: Полет, Бдительность, Ускорение
foreignNames.flavor: Наездники на богомолах знают, что их верховым насекомым неведома верность. Даже богомол, на котором ездили много лет, не задумываясь сожрет всадника, если тот хоть на миг утратит осторожность.

foreignNames.name: Cabalgador de mantis
foreignNames.text: Vuela, vigilancia, prisa.
foreignNames.flavor: Los cabalgadores de mantis saben que sus monturas no les deben lealtad. Incluso una mantis que hubiera servido durante años se zamparía a su jinete si este perdiera la concentración por un solo momento.

cards.originalText: Flying, vigilance, haste
cards.text: Flying, vigilance, haste

foreignNames.name: 玛尔都霸权
foreignNames.text:

foreignNames.name: 瑪爾都霸權
foreignNames.text:

foreignNames.name: Ascendance marduenne
foreignNames.text:
À chaque fois qu'une créature non-jeton que vous contrôlez attaque, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 1/1 rouge Gobelin, engagé et attaquant.
Sacrifiez l'Ascendance marduenne : Les créatures que vous contrôlez gagnent +0/+3 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignNames.name: Vormacht der Mardu
foreignNames.text:
Immer wenn eine Nichtspielsteinkreatur, die du kontrollierst, angreift, bringe einen 1/1 roten Goblin-Kreaturenspielstein getappt und angreifend ins Spiel.
Opfere die Vormacht der Mardu: Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, erhalten +0/+3 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignNames.name: Autorità Mardu
foreignNames.text:
Ogniqualvolta una creatura non pedina che controlli attacca, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Goblin 1/1 rossa TAPpata e attaccante.
Sacrifica l'Autorità Mardu: Le creature che controlli prendono +0/+3 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignNames.name: マルドゥの隆盛
foreignNames.text:
あなたがコントロールするトークンでないクリーチャーが１体攻撃するたび、赤の１/１のゴブリン・クリーチャー・トークンを１体タップ状態で攻撃している状態で戦場に出す。
マルドゥの隆盛を生け贄に捧げる：ターン終了時まで、あなたがコントロールするクリーチャーは＋０/＋３の修整を受ける。

foreignNames.name: 마르두의 지배력
foreignNames.text:
당신이 조종하는 생물 중 토큰이 아닌 생물이 공격할 때마다, 1/1 적색 고블린 생물 토큰 한 개를 탭되어 공격하는 상태로 전장에 놓는다.
마르두의 지배력을 희생한다: 당신이 조종하는 생물들은 턴종료까지 +0/+3을 받는다.

foreignNames.name: Ascendência Mardu
foreignNames.text:
Toda vez que uma criatura que não seja ficha que você controla atacar, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura vermelha 1/1 do tipo Goblin virada e atacando.
Sacrifique Ascendência Mardu: As criaturas que você controla recebem +0/+3 até o final do turno.

foreignNames.name: Возвышение Марду
foreignNames.text:
Каждый раз, когда не являющееся фишкой существо под вашим контролем атакует, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 1/1 красный Гоблин повернутой и атакующей.
Пожертвуйте Возвышение Марду: существа под вашим контролем получают +0/+3 до конца хода.

foreignNames.name: Supremacía mardu
foreignNames.text:

Sacrificar la Supremacía mardu: Las criaturas que controlas obtienen +0/+3 hasta el final del turno.

cards.name: Mardu Ascendancy
cards.originalText:
Whenever a nontoken creature you control attacks, put a 1/1 red Goblin creature token onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.
Sacrifice Mardu Ascendancy: Creatures you control get +0/+3 until end of turn.

rulings.text: As the Goblin token enters the battlefield, you choose which opponent or opposing planeswalker it’s attacking. It doesn’t have to attack the same opponent or opposing planeswalker that the original creature is attacking.
Although the tokens are attacking, they were never declared as attacking creatures (for purposes of abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks, for example).

foreignNames.name: 玛尔都护符
foreignNames.text:
选择一项～

•将两个1/1白色战士衍生生物放进战场。他们获得先攻异能直到回合结束。
•目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非生物且非地的牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。

foreignNames.name: 瑪爾都護符
foreignNames.text:

•目標對手展示其手牌。你選擇其中一張非生物且非地的牌。該玩家棄掉該牌。

foreignNames.name: Charme de Mardu
foreignNames.text:
Choisissez l'un —
• Le Charme de Mardu inflige 4 blessures à une créature ciblée.
• Mettez sur le champ de bataille deux jetons de créature 1/1 blanche Guerrier. Ils acquièrent l'initiative jusqu'à la fin du tour.
• L'adversaire ciblé révèle sa main. Vous y choisissez une carte non-créature, non-terrain. Ce joueur se défausse de cette carte.

foreignNames.name: Mardu-Amulett
foreignNames.text:
Bestimme eines —
• Das Mardu-Amulett fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte zu.
• Bringe zwei 1/1 weiße Krieger-Kreaturenspielsteine ins Spiel. Sie erhalten Erstschlag bis zum Ende des Zuges.
• Ein Gegner deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Du bestimmst eine Karte davon, die weder eine Kreatur noch ein Land ist. Dieser Spieler wirft diese Karte ab.

foreignNames.name: Talismano Mardu
foreignNames.text:
Scegli uno —
• Il Talismano Mardu infligge 4 danni a una creatura bersaglio.
• Metti sul campo di battaglia due pedine creatura Guerriero 1/1 bianche. Hanno attacco improvviso fino alla fine del turno.
• Un avversario bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta non terra, non creatura da quella mano. Quel giocatore scarta quella carta.

foreignNames.name: マルドゥの魔除け
foreignNames.text:
以下から１つを選ぶ。
・クリーチャー１体を対象とする。マルドゥの魔除けはそれに４点のダメージを与える。
・白の１/１の戦士・クリーチャー・トークンを２体戦場に出す。ターン終了時まで、それらは先制攻撃を得る。
・対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中のクリーチャーでも土地でもないカードを１枚選ぶ。そのプレイヤーはそのカードを捨てる。

foreignNames.name: 마르두 부적
foreignNames.text:
하나를 선택한다 —
• 생물을 목표로 정한다. 마르두 부적은 그 생물에 피해 4점을 입힌다.
• 1/1 백색 전사 생물 토큰 두 개를 전장에 놓는다. 그 토큰들은 턴종료까지 선제공격을 얻는다.
• 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 자신의 손을 공개한다. 그중 생물이 아니고 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 선택한다. 그 플레이어는 그 카드를 버린다.

foreignNames.name: Amuleto Mardu
foreignNames.text:
Escolha um —
• Amuleto Mardu causa 4 pontos de dano à criatura alvo.
• Coloque no campo de batalha duas fichas de criatura brancas 1/1 do tipo Guerreiro. Elas ganham iniciativa até o final do turno.
• O oponente alvo revela a própria mão. Você escolhe um card que não seja um terreno nem uma criatura da mão dele. Aquele jogador descarta aquele card.

foreignNames.name: Талисман Марду
foreignNames.text:
Выберите одно —
• Талисман Марду наносит 4 повреждения целевому существу.
• Положите на поле битвы две фишки существа 1/1 белый Воин. Они получают Первый удар до конца хода.
• Целевой оппонент показывает свою руку. Вы выбираете из нее карту, не являющуюся ни существом, ни землей. Тот игрок сбрасывает ту карту.

foreignNames.name: Sortilegio mardu
foreignNames.text:
Elige uno:
• El Sortilegio mardu hace 4 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo.
• Pon en el campo de batalla dos fichas de criatura Guerrero blancas 1/1. Ganan la habilidad de dañar primero hasta el final del turno.
• El oponente objetivo muestra su mano. Tú eliges de ahí una carta que no sea tierra ni criatura. Ese jugador descarta esa carta.

cards.name: Mardu Charm

• Put two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens onto the battlefield. They gain first strike until end of turn.
• Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Master the Way
cards.originalText: Draw a card. Master the Way deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of cards in your hand.

rulings.text: Use the number of cards in your hand after you draw the card to determine how much damage Master the Way deals to the target creature or player. (Remember that Master the Way is not in your hand; it’s on the stack.)
If the creature or player is an illegal target as Master the Way tries to resolve, Master the Way will be countered and none of its effects will happen. You won’t draw a card.

cards.name: Narset, Enlightened Master
cards.originalText:
First strike, hexproof
Whenever Narset, Enlightened Master attacks, exile the top four cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast noncreature cards exiled with Narset this turn without paying their mana costs.

rulings.text: The cards are exiled face up. Casting the noncreature cards exiled this way follows the normal rules for casting those cards. You must follow all applicable timing rules. For example, if one of the exiled cards is a sorcery card, you can cast it only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
You can’t play any land cards exiled with Narset.

Because you’re already casting the card using an alternative cost (by casting it without paying its mana cost), you can’t pay any other alternative costs for the card, including casting it face down using the morph ability. You can pay additional costs, such as kicker costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those.
If the card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value for X when casting it.
Any exiled cards you don’t cast remain in exile.

cards.name: Ponyback Brigade
cards.originalText:
When Ponyback Brigade enters the battlefield or is turned face up, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Morph {2}{R}{W}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

rulings.text: Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

cards.name: Ride Down
cards.originalText: Destroy target blocking creature. Creatures that were blocked by that creature this combat gain trample until end of turn.

rulings.text: The attacking creatures that the destroyed creature was blocking remain blocked (even if no other creatures were blocking them). An attacking creature with trample that has no creature blocking it can deal its combat damage to the defending player or planeswalker.

In some rare cases, the blocking creature wasn’t declared as a blocking creature that combat (for example, if it entered the battlefield blocking). In that case, the attacking creatures it was blocking won’t gain trample even though the blocking creature is destroyed.

cards.name: Sagu Mauler
cards.originalText:
Trample, hexproof
Morph {3}{G}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

rulings.text: Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

rulings.text: Sidisi’s last ability triggers any time creature cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere in your library, not just from the top.

Any instruction, including Sidisi’s first ability, that tells you to put multiple cards from a library into a graveyard moves all the cards at the same time. For example, if Sidisi enters the battlefield and you put three creature cards into your graveyard, Sidisi’s last ability will trigger once and you’ll put one Zombie token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Snowhorn Rider
cards.originalText:
Trample
Morph {2}{G}{U}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

rulings.text: Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

cards.name: Temur Charm
cards.originalText:
Choose one —
• Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control.
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
• Creatures with power 3 or less can't block this turn.

rulings.text: You can’t cast Temur Charm choosing the first mode unless you target both a creature you control and a creature you don’t control.
If the first mode was chosen and either target is an illegal target when Temur Charm tries to resolve, neither creature will deal or be dealt damage.

If the first mode was chosen and just the creature you control is an illegal target when Temur Charm tries to resolve, it won’t get +1/+1 until end of turn. If the creature you control is a legal target but the creature you don’t control isn’t, the creature you control will get +1/+1 until end of turn.

If the third mode was chosen, creatures with power 3 or less that enter the battlefield after Temur Charm resolves also can’t block. A creature whose power was 4 or greater when Temur Charm resolved but is 3 or less as the declare blockers step begins also can’t block.

cards.name: Villainous Wealth
cards.originalText: Target opponent exiles the top X cards of his or her library. You may cast any number of nonland cards with converted mana cost X or less from among them without paying their mana costs.

rulings.text: You cast the cards one at a time as Villainous Wealth is resolving, choosing modes, targets, and so on. The last card you cast will be the first one to resolve. Ignore timing restrictions based on the cards’ types. Other timing restrictions, such as “Cast [this card] only during combat,” must be followed.

Because you’re already casting the cards using an alternative cost (by casting them without paying their mana costs), you can’t pay any other alternative costs for the cards, including casting them face down using the morph ability. You can pay additional costs, such as kicker costs. If the cards have any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those.
If a card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value for X when casting it.
Any cards you don’t cast this way will remain in exile.

rulings.text: You choose which mode you’re using—or that you’re using both modes—as you’re casting the spell. Once this choice is made, it can’t be changed later while the spell is on the stack.
If you choose both modes, they can each target the same creature or they can target different creatures.
Winterflame won’t affect any target that’s illegal as it tries to resolve. If you choose to use both modes and both targets are illegal at that time, Winterflame will be countered.

Zurgo Helmsmasher has indestructible as long as it's your turn.
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Zurgo Helmsmasher this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Zurgo Helmsmasher.

rulings.text: You still choose which player or planeswalker Zurgo Helmsmasher attacks.

If, during your declare attackers step, Zurgo is tapped or is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, then it doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having Zurgo attack, you aren’t forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to attack in that case either.

If Zurgo enters the battlefield before the combat phase, it will attack that turn if able. If it enters the battlefield after combat, it won’t attack that turn and will usually be available to block on the following turn.

Each time a creature dies, check whether Zurgo had dealt any damage to it at any time during that turn. If so, Zurgo’s ability will trigger. It doesn’t matter who controlled the creature or whose graveyard it went to.

foreignNames.name: 族群祭坛
foreignNames.text: 每当另一个永久物在你的操控下进战场时，每位对手各将其牌库顶牌置入其坟墓场。

foreignNames.name: 族群祭壇
foreignNames.text: 每當另一個永久物在你的操控下進戰場時，每位對手各將其牌庫頂牌置入其墳墓場。
foreignNames.flavor: 祈求者獻上鮮肉與白銀、鮮花和血液。祭壇取走它想要的，眼睛閃爍著不成文的諾言。

foreignNames.name: Autel de la Couvée
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois qu'un autre permanent arrive le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, chaque adversaire met la carte du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: Les quémandeurs déposent de la chair et de l'argent, des fleurs et du sang. L'autel prend ce qui lui convient, les yeux luisants de promesses inexprimées.

foreignNames.name: Altar der Brut
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn eine andere bleibende Karte unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, legt jeder Gegner die oberste Karte seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.
foreignNames.flavor: Bittsteller bringen Fleisch und Silber, Blumen und Blut. Der Altar nimmt sich, was er will, mit glühenden Augen voller Verheißung.

foreignNames.name: Altare della Nidiata
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta un altro permanente entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, ogni avversario mette nel proprio cimitero la prima carta del proprio grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: I supplici offrono carne e argento, fiori e sangue. L'altare accetta ciò che predilige, i suoi occhi splendenti di promesse silenziose.

foreignNames.name: 群の祭壇
foreignNames.text: 他のパーマネントが１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、各対戦相手はそれぞれ自分のライブラリーの一番上のカードを自分の墓地に置く。
foreignNames.flavor: 嘆願者は肉や銀や花や血を奉納する。祭壇は望むものを取り、その目は語られざる約束で輝きを放っている。

foreignNames.name: 군락의 제단
foreignNames.text: 당신의 조종하에 다른 지속물이 전장에 들어올 때마다, 각 상대는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 한 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 집행자는 살점과 은, 꽃, 피를 바친다. 제단은 말없이 약속하는 눈빛을 발하며 원하는 제물을 취한다.

foreignNames.name: Altar da Linhagem

foreignNames.name: Алтарь Выводка

foreignNames.flavor: Просители приносят плоть и серебро, цветы и кровь. Алтарь принимает то, что ему угодно, и его глаза сияют невысказанными обещаниями.

foreignNames.name: Altar de la progenie

cards.name: Dragon Throne of Tarkir
cards.originalText:
Equipped creature has defender and "{2}, {T}: Other creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is this creature's power."
Equip {3}

rulings.text: The value of X is determined as the activated ability resolves. If the equipped creature isn’t on the battlefield at that time, use its power the last time it was on the battlefield to determine the value of X. If that power was negative, other creatures you control will lose power and toughness. For example, if the equipped creature was 2/2 and a spell gave it -5/-5 in response to Dragon Throne of Tarkir’s activated ability, other creatures you control would get -3/-3 until end of turn.

foreignNames.flavor: Conçus par un ancien artificier, les meilleurs arcs marduens sont taillés dans l'os de dragon, avec le vent en guise de corde.

foreignNames.flavor: Die besten Bögen der Mardu, ersonnen von einem Meisterhandwerker alter Zeit, sind aus Drachenknochen gefertigt und mit dem Wind selbst bespannt.

foreignNames.flavor: Progettati da un antico artefice, i migliori archi dei Mardu sono intagliati nelle ossa di drago e incordati con il vento stesso.

foreignNames.name: 心臓貫きの弓

foreignNames.name: 심장을 관통하는 활

foreignNames.flavor: 고대의 기능공이 설계한 마르두 최고의 활들은 용의 뼈를 깎아 만든 활대에 바람 그 자체를 걸어 활시위로 삼았다.

cards.name: Heart-Piercer Bow
cards.originalText:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, Heart-Piercer Bow deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls.
Equip {1}

rulings.text: The controller of Heart-Piercer Bow chooses the target of the triggered ability. Heart-Piercer Bow is the source of the damage, not the equipped creature.
The triggered ability resolves before blockers are declared.

In some rare cases, a Heart-Piercer Bow you control may be attached to a creature that’s attacking you or a planeswalker you control. In that case, you choose the target of the triggered ability, but as you are the defending player, you must choose a creature you control as the target.

cards.name: Lens of Clarity
cards.originalText: You may look at the top card of your library and at face-down creatures you don't control. (You may do this at any time.)

rulings.text: Lens of Clarity lets you look at the top card of your library and at face-down creatures you don’t control whenever you want, even if you don’t have priority. This action doesn’t use the stack. Knowing what those cards are becomes part of the information you have access to, just like you can look at the cards in your hand.
Lens of Clarity doesn’t stop your opponents from looking at face-down creatures they control.
Lens of Clarity doesn’t let you look at face-down spells you don’t control on the stack.

{G}{U}{R}, {T}, opfere das Banner der Temur: Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: Wildheit, um zu überleben, Mut, um zu triumphieren.

foreignNames.name: Stendardo Temur
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {G}, {U} o {R} alla tua riserva di mana.
{G}{U}{R}, {T}, Sacrifica lo Stendardo Temur: Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Barbarie per sopravvivere, coraggio per trionfare.

foreignNames.name: ティムールの戦旗
foreignNames.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{G}か{U}か{R}を加える。
{G}{U}{R}, {T}, ティムールの戦旗を生け贄に捧げる：カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 獰猛で生存、勇気で勝利。

foreignNames.name: 테무르 깃발
foreignNames.text:
{T}: {G}, {U} 또는 {R}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
{G}{U}{R}, {T}, 테무르 깃발을 희생한다: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 생존을 위한 야만성, 승리를 위한 용기.

foreignNames.name: Estandarte Temur
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {G}, {U} ou {R} à sua reserva de mana.
{G}{U}{R}, {T}, Sacrifique Estandarte Temur: Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: Ferocidade para sobreviver, coragem para triunfar.

foreignNames.name: Знамя Темура
foreignNames.text:
{T}: добавьте {G}, {U} или {R} в ваше хранилище маны.
{G}{U}{R}, {T}, пожертвуйте Знамя Темура: возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Жестокость — чтобы выжить, отвага — чтобы победить.

foreignNames.name: Estandarte temur
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {G}, {U} o {R} a tu reserva de maná.
{G}{U}{R}, {T}, sacrificar el Estandarte temur: Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Ferocidad para sobrevivir, valor para triunfar.

cards.name: Temur Banner
cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {R} to your mana pool.
{G}{U}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Temur Banner: Draw a card.
cards.text:
{T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {R} to your mana pool.
{G}{U}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Temur Banner: Draw a card.

cards.flavor: All at once Sarkhan's mind fell silent.

foreignNames.name: 乌金连结点
foreignNames.text:
如果某牌手将开始额外的一个回合，则改为该牌手略过该回合。
如果乌金连结点将从战场进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐，并在本回合后进行额外的一个回合。
foreignNames.flavor: 萨坎脑中幽声此刻全数止歇。

foreignNames.name: 烏金連結點
foreignNames.text:
如果某玩家將開始額外的一個回合，則改為該玩家略過該回合。
如果烏金連結點將從戰場進入墳墓場，則改為將它放逐，並在本回合後進行額外的一個回合。
foreignNames.flavor: 薩坎腦中幽聲此刻全數止歇。

foreignNames.name: Nexus d'Ugin
foreignNames.text:
Si un joueur devait commencer un tour supplémentaire, ce joueur passe ce tour à la place.
Si le Nexus d'Ugin devait être mis dans un cimetière depuis le champ de bataille, à la place, exilez-le et jouez un tour supplémentaire après celui-ci.
foreignNames.flavor: Tout à coup, l'esprit de Sarkhan fut silencieux.

foreignNames.name: Ugins Nexus
foreignNames.text:
Falls ein Spieler einen zusätzlichen Zug beginnen würde, überspringt er stattdessen diesen Zug.
Falls Ugins Nexus aus dem Spiel auf einen Friedhof gelegt würde, schicke ihn stattdessen ins Exil und du erhältst nach diesem Zug einen zusätzlichen Zug.
foreignNames.flavor: Auf einmal verstummte die Stimme in Sarkhans Kopf.

foreignNames.name: Fulcro di Ugin
foreignNames.text:
Se un giocatore sta per iniziare un turno extra, quel giocatore salta invece quel turno.
Se il Fulcro di Ugin sta per essere messo in un cimitero dal campo di battaglia, invece esilialo e gioca un turno extra dopo questo.
foreignNames.flavor: D'un tratto, nella mente di Sarkhan calò il silenzio.

foreignNames.name: ウギンのきずな
foreignNames.text:
プレイヤーが追加ターンを始めるなら、代わりにそのプレイヤーはそのターンを飛ばす。
ウギンのきずなが戦場から墓地に置かれるなら、代わりにこれを追放し、このターンの直後に追加の１ターンを行う。
foreignNames.flavor: 突然、サルカンの精神は静寂に包まれた。

foreignNames.name: 우진의 결합점
foreignNames.text:
플레이어가 추가 턴을 시작하려고 한다면, 대신에 그 플레이어는 그 턴을 건너뛴다.
우진의 결합점이 전장에서 무덤으로 들어가려고 하면, 대신에 우진의 결합점을 추방하고 이번 턴 후에 추가로 턴을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 사르칸의 정신은 갑자기 침묵에 잠겼다.

foreignNames.name: Nexus de Ugin
foreignNames.text:
Se um jogador for começar um turno extra, em vez disso, o jogador pula aquele turno.
Se Nexus de Ugin seria colocado no cemitério vindo do campo de batalha, em vez disso, exile-o e jogue um turno extra após esse.
foreignNames.flavor: De repente, a mente de Sarkhan ficou em silêncio.

foreignNames.name: Нексус Уджина
foreignNames.text:
Если игрок должен начать дополнительный ход, вместо этого тот игрок пропускает тот ход.
Если Нексус Уджина должен попасть на кладбище с поля битвы, вместо этого изгоните его и сделайте дополнительный ход вслед за этим.
foreignNames.flavor: В одно мгновение в голове у Сархана стало тихо.

foreignNames.name: Nexo de Ugin
foreignNames.text:
Si un jugador fuera a comenzar un turno adicional, en vez de eso, ese jugador se salta ese turno.
Si el Nexo de Ugin fuera a ser puesto en un cementerio desde el campo de batalla, en vez de eso, exílialo y juega un turno adicional después de este.
foreignNames.flavor: De repente, la mente de Sarkhan quedó en silencio.

cards.name: Ugin's Nexus
cards.originalText:
If a player would begin an extra turn, that player skips that turn instead.
If Ugin's Nexus would be put into a graveyard from the battlefield, instead exile it and take an extra turn after this one.
cards.text:
If a player would begin an extra turn, that player skips that turn instead.
If Ugin's Nexus would be put into a graveyard from the battlefield, instead exile it and take an extra turn after this one.

cards.flavor: It strode through the clash of dragons, the fall of Ugin, and the rise of the khans.

foreignNames.name: 岁月见证人
foreignNames.text: 变身{5}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）
foreignNames.flavor: 它经历了巨龙的冲突、乌金的死亡以及可汗的崛起。

foreignNames.name: 歲月見證人
foreignNames.text: 變身{5}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌並支付{3}，將其當成2/2生物。可隨時支付其變身費用使其翻回正面。）
foreignNames.flavor: 它經歷了巨龍的衝突、烏金的死亡以及可汗的崛起。

foreignNames.name: Témoin des âges
foreignNames.text: Mue {5} (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte face cachée comme une créature 2/2 pour {3}. Retournez-la à tout moment pour son coût de mue.)
foreignNames.flavor: Il traversa la guerre des dragons, la chute d'Ugin et l'ascension des khans.

foreignNames.name: Zeuge der Zeitalter
foreignNames.text: Morph {5} (Du kannst diese Karte verdeckt für {3} als eine 2/2 Kreatur wirken. Decke sie zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt für ihre Morph-Kosten auf.)
foreignNames.flavor: Er erlebte die Kämpfe der Drachen, den Fall Ugins und den Aufstieg der Khans.

foreignNames.name: Testimone dell'Eternità
foreignNames.text: Metamorfosi {5} (Puoi lanciare questa carta a faccia in giù come una creatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Girala a faccia in su in qualsiasi momento pagando il suo costo di metamorfosi.)
foreignNames.flavor: Ha assistito allo scontro dei draghi, alla caduta di Ugin e all'ascesa dei khan.

foreignNames.name: 星霜の証人
foreignNames.text: 変異{5}（あなたはこのカードを、{3}で２/２クリーチャーとして裏向きに唱えてもよい。これの変異コストで、これをいつでも表向きにしてよい。）
foreignNames.flavor: それは龍たちの激突、ウギンの最後、そしてカンたちの興隆のすべての時代を歩いてきた。

foreignNames.name: 시대의 증인
foreignNames.text: 변이 {5} (당신은 {3}을 지불해서 이 카드를 뒷면 상태의 2/2 생물로 발동할 수 있다. 언제든지 변이 비용을 지불하고 앞면이 보이도록 뒤집을 수 있다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 이 골렘은 용들의 격돌부터 우진의 죽음, 그리고 칸들의 등장까지 함께 걸어왔다.

foreignNames.name: Testemunha das Eras
foreignNames.text: Metamorfose {5} (Você pode conjurar este card com a face voltada para baixo como uma criatura 2/2 por {3}. Volte sua face para cima a qualquer momento pagando seu custo de metamorfose.)
foreignNames.flavor: Ele passou pela guerra dos dragões, pela queda de Ugin e pelo surgimento dos khans.

foreignNames.name: Свидетель Веков
foreignNames.text: Оборотень {5} (Вы можете разыграть эту карту рубашкой вверх как существо 2/2 за {3}. Переверните ее рубашкой вниз в любой момент за ее стоимость Оборотня.)
foreignNames.flavor: Сражались драконы, пал Уджин, пришли к власти ханы, а он все бродил по земле.

foreignNames.name: Testigo de las eras
foreignNames.text: Metamorfosis {5}. (Puedes lanzar esta carta boca abajo como una criatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Ponla boca arriba en cualquier momento pagando su coste de metamorfosis.)
foreignNames.flavor: No cesó de avanzar cuando se enfrentaron los dragones, cuando Ugin cayó ni cuando se alzaron los kans.

cards.name: Witness of the Ages
cards.originalText: Morph {5} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

rulings.text: Morph lets you cast a card face down by paying {3}, and lets you turn the face-down permanent face up any time you have priority by paying its morph cost.

The face-down spell has no mana cost and has a converted mana cost of 0. When you cast a face-down spell, put it on the stack face down so no other player knows what it is, and pay {3}. This is an alternative cost.

When the spell resolves, it enters the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. It’s colorless and has a converted mana cost of 0. Other effects that apply to the creature can still grant it any of these characteristics.

Any time you have priority, you may turn the face-down creature face up by revealing what its morph cost is and paying that cost. This is a special action. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. Only a face-down permanent can be turned face up this way; a face-down spell cannot.
Because the permanent is on the battlefield both before and after it’s turned face up, turning a permanent face up doesn’t cause any enters-the-battlefield abilities to trigger.

A permanent that turns face up or face down changes characteristics but is otherwise the same permanent. Spells and abilities that were targeting that permanent, as well as Auras and Equipment that were attached to the permanent, aren’t affected.
At any time, you can look at a face-down spell or permanent you control. You can’t look at face-down spells or permanents you don’t control unless an effect instructs you to do so.

You must ensure that your face-down spells and permanents can easily be differentiated from each other. You’re not allowed to mix up the cards that represent them on the battlefield in order to confuse other players. The order they entered the battlefield should remain clear. Common methods for doing this include using markers or dice, or simply placing them in order on the battlefield.
If a face-down permanent leaves the battlefield, you must reveal it. You must also reveal all face-down spells and permanents you control if you leave the game or if the game ends.

cards.text: Morph {5} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

foreignNames.name: 染血洞窟
foreignNames.text:
染血洞窟须横置进战场。
当染血洞窟进战场时，你获得1点生命。
{T}：加{B}或{R}到你的法术力池中。

foreignNames.name: 染血洞窟
foreignNames.text:
染血洞窟須橫置進戰場。
當染血洞窟進戰場時，你獲得1點生命。
{T}：加{B}或{R}到你的魔法力池中。

foreignNames.name: Cavernes du Sacrifice
foreignNames.text:
Les Cavernes du Sacrifice arrivent sur le champ de bataille engagées.
Quand les Cavernes du Sacrifice arrivent sur le champ de bataille, vous gagnez 1 point de vie.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou {R} à votre réserve.

foreignNames.name: Höhlen des Blutvergießens
foreignNames.text:
Die Höhlen des Blutvergießens kommen getappt ins Spiel.
Wenn die Höhlen des Blutvergießens ins Spiel kommen, erhältst du 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {B} oder {R}.

foreignNames.name: Caverne del Sangue Versato
foreignNames.text:
Le Caverne del Sangue Versato entrano nel campo di battaglia TAPpate.
Quando le Caverne del Sangue Versato entrano nel campo di battaglia, guadagni 1 punto vita.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o {R} alla tua riserva di mana.

foreignNames.name: 血溜まりの洞窟
foreignNames.text:
血溜まりの洞窟はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
血溜まりの洞窟が戦場に出たとき、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{B}か{R}を加える。

foreignNames.name: 핏자국 동굴
foreignNames.text:
핏자국 동굴은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
핏자국 동굴이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.
{T}: {B} 또는 {R}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.

foreignNames.name: Cavernas Sanguinárias
foreignNames.text:
Cavernas Sanguinárias entra no campo de batalha virado.
Quando Cavernas Sanguinárias entra no campo de batalha, você ganha 1 ponto de vida.
{T}: Adicione {B} ou {R} à sua reserva de mana.

foreignNames.name: Пещеры Пролитой Крови
foreignNames.text:
Пещеры Пролитой Крови выходят на поле битвы повернутыми.
Когда Пещеры Пролитой Крови выходят на поле битвы, вы получаете 1 жизнь.
{T}: добавьте {B} или {R} в ваше хранилище маны.

foreignNames.name: Cuevas maculasangrientas
foreignNames.text:
Las Cuevas maculasangrientas entran al campo de batalla giradas.
Cuando las Cuevas maculasangrientas entren al campo de batalla, ganas 1 vida.
{T}: Agrega {B} o {R} a tu reserva de maná.

cards.name: Bloodfell Caves
cards.originalText:
Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped.
When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
cards.text:
Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped.
When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: Where dragons once triumphed, their bones now molder.

foreignNames.name: 血斑泥沼
foreignNames.text: {T}，支付1点生命，牺牲血斑泥沼：从你的牌库中搜寻一张沼泽或山脉牌，并将之放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 群龙得胜处，空余骨朽败。

foreignNames.name: 血斑泥沼
foreignNames.text: {T}，支付1點生命，犧牲血斑泥沼：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張沼澤或山脈牌，並將之放進戰場。然後將你的牌庫洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 群龍得勝處，空餘骨朽敗。

foreignNames.name: Fondrière sanguinolente
foreignNames.text: {T}, payez 1 point de vie, sacrifiez la Fondrière sanguinolente : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de marais ou de montagne et mettez-la sur le champ de bataille. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: Là où les dragons triomphèrent jadis, leurs os pourrissent désormais.

foreignNames.name: Blutbeflecktes Schlammloch
foreignNames.text: {T}, bezahle 1 Lebenspunkt, opfere das Blutbefleckte Schlammloch: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Sumpf- oder Gebirge-Karte und bringe sie ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Wo Drachen einst triumphierten, modern nun ihre Knochen.

foreignNames.name: Pantano Insanguinato
foreignNames.text: {T}, Paga 1 punto vita, Sacrifica il Pantano Insanguinato: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Palude o Montagna e mettila sul campo di battaglia. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: Dove un tempo trionfavano i draghi, ora marciscono le loro ossa.

foreignNames.name: 血染めのぬかるみ
foreignNames.text: {T}, ライフを１点支払う, 血染めのぬかるみを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから沼・カードか山・カードを１枚探し、それを戦場に出す。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: かつて龍たちが勝利した場所には、今では彼らの苔生した骨だけが残っている。

foreignNames.name: 피에 물든 수렁
foreignNames.text: {T}, 생명 1점을 지불한다, 피에 물든 수렁을 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 늪이나 산 카드 한 장을 찾아 전장에 놓는다. 그러고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 한때 용들이 호령하던 이곳에는 이제 썩어 가는 용의 뼈만 남아있다.

foreignNames.name: Lamaçal Ensanguentado
foreignNames.text: {T}, Pague 1 ponto de vida, Sacrifique Lamaçal Ensanguentado: Procure um card de Pântano ou Montanha em seu grimório e coloque-o no campo de batalha. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: Onde os dragões outrora triunfaram, seus ossos hoje apodrecem.

foreignNames.name: Кровавая Топь
foreignNames.text: {T}, заплатите 1 жизнь, пожертвуйте Кровавую Топь: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту Болота или Горы и положите ее на поле битвы. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: Там, где когда-то торжествовали драконы, теперь гниют их кости.

foreignNames.name: Cenagal ensangrentado
foreignNames.text: {T}, pagar 1 vida, sacrificar el Cenagal ensangrentado: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de pantano o montaña y ponla en el campo de batalla. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: Allá donde en otro tiempo triunfaron los dragones, ahora se pudren sus huesos.

foreignNames.name: Arenas florecientes
foreignNames.text:
Las Arenas florecientes entran al campo de batalla giradas.

{T}: Agrega {G} o {W} a tu reserva de maná.

Cuando la Laguna lúgubre entre al campo de batalla, ganas 1 vida.
